Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Spanish Civil War Letters
Jackson, Kevin
ALBA.308
0.5 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box.
1929-1944 This collection of Spanish Civil War Letters documents events and activities that occurred prior to and post war from 1929 to 1944. The collection is comprised of correspondence in both letter and postcard formats. The handwritten letters are from different participants and times during the war, and include written communication between soldiers and their family members; government officials; prisoners of war; and others. This collection documents particular activities of the Spanish Civil War from the personal perspectives of these individuals. Materials primarily in Spanish with brief summaries of the groups of correspondence translated into English.
Scope and Contents
This collection of Spanish Civil War Letters consists of correspondence in both letter and postcard formats. The handwritten letters are from different participants and times during the war, and include written communication between soldiers and their family members; government officials; prisoners of war; and others. This collection documents particular activities of the Spanish Civil War from the personal perspectives of these individuals.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1929-1944, are expected to enter the public domain in 2049.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials were purchased from Kevin Jackson in 2015; there is no previous documentation concerning the provenance of these materials before they came into the vendor's possession. The accession number associated with this purchase is 2019.022.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Spanish Civil War Letters; ALBA 308; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, materials were removed from their plastic bags and placed in new acid-free folders and boxes. Materials that were loose was foldered and titled. Original caption information, when available, was transcribed onto acid-free archival folders. Where captions were illegible, the archivist's interpretation is enclosed in square brackets. All materials were organized in the order the content was received. A letter and an envelope from Folder 4 was treated for mold. These materials were returned to its original folder.
